website_summaries.verdict: Sporty chronograph with unique watch face and date and time markings.
pros: Affordable Swiss timepiece with accurate quartz movement and date function
cons: Setting the date function can be complicated
Sleek calfskin bad with deployment clasp

customer_reviews.title: this watch is the best one so far for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying a watch through Amazon & let me tell you,this watch is the best one so far for the money . I'm very satisfied with the purchase & if there was an option for 10 stars I would've given it . It came on time in pristine condition. The watch is perfect & looks very sharp on my wrist I was a bit skeptical about the size 42mm but I was proven wrong . In the past I always wore a 48mm to 50mm but in sport(DIGITAL) watches . My next watch will be a Tag Heuer or Edox & Amazon has the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Qazi Salman

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tissot, they are great entry level real Swiss watches. This one is Quartz so the time keeping is excellent, but what's great about this watch is that it keeps the date concurrent to the month you are in, even with leap years, so you only need to adjust daylight savings. The strap quality is so so, but the detailing and feel of the watch itself is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I thing this watch is beautiful and like the perpetual calendar feature
customer_reviews.text: I thing this watch is beautiful and like the perpetual calendar feature. However date dials have small numbers/letters and that can be a problem if you use reading glasses. Don't let you fool by the enlarged image in your computer screen. By the way, Amazon should try to add a realistic size image for these kind of items.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Just be mindful..
customer_reviews.text: I love watches and wanted a Tissot to add to my collection. I love having multiple functions on watches. However, this watch is a bear to keep date, day, month and time synched together..
customer_reviews.author: kevin miller

customer_reviews.title: Deffective in functionality
customer_reviews.text: The hands for date, day, and month won’t stay as set. I have to keep setting it every time I wear the watch which is a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: A Fellow Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A good Tissot watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Tissot is one of my favorite watches, happy with watch, the months, days and dates are little small to see clearly. Gave it 4 stars because the sound of the second movement is little bit loud for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: FYZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and works great, perpetual calendar
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the classical look and perpetual calendar. Beautiful piece and works great! It sit quite light on my wrist, and feels very comfortable even when I'm typing or doing other things
customer_reviews.author: Jay. L

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this watch for his birthday, and it is really nice looking in person. The box it comes in is well designed, and the watch itself is stunning in person - looks very expensive. This was also a better price than I found at a few department stores that carried it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah0017

customer_reviews.title: Good stylish watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as birthday gift for my son as a stylish watch to wear out and he absolutely loved it. Very fashionable and with as sapphire crystal was a very good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Tissot
customer_reviews.text: A good looking watch with an analogue display for perpetual calendar. It is suitable for both business and casual occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Bancha Ovartlarnporn

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have it
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it one month back.The month,week date and time all are working fine.It changes on periodic time without fail
customer_reviews.author: mahesh

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Tissot is a great watch to own.This is my fourth...Excellent details, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: great quality at a good price, I had it for about a week now and I love it. I bought it through Watchsavings and I got it the next day, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Emad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing watch. Looks better in personal. Check the video if you wanna see how it really looks like. I have no complains. I love it. Shipping was really quick. I ordered it on monday and got it on thursday.
customer_reviews.author: Vipin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some issues but I received a great support for seller.
customer_reviews.author: Thao Lam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is number one very good i am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Soleyman Nabati

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience from watch city.
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited but the watch was not working. The minute hand was moving but the other needles were not responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Francis

customer_reviews.title: ... I get a luxury watch that I won't only love but also understand)
customer_reviews.text: I am a newcomer to the world of watches and I wanted an entry-level Swiss made watch (mainly because of budget and because I want to be able to know a little more about watches before I get a luxury watch that I won't only love but also understand). With a perpetual calendar and an elegant flair, this watch to me is top of its class. The watch itself and the experience you get by reading the novel-like add on (which explains the history of Tissot) gives you not only a great first-watch experience but also an appreciation of what you're getting. I have no complaints to give so far and hold Tissot in high regard thanks to this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch to my nefhew and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Liliane B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch - nice watch book bu no instruction ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch - nice watch book bu no instruction booklet, I can't figure out watch clasp, I will send back and purchase same watch from a store with instructions. I'm starting to think buying watches on line is a bad idea - it might save money but not worth hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch poor package
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the watch. It's certainly an older model but so what. Only thing is that the watch container was dry rotted basically and broke apart at the bottom. So it doesn't look as good on my dresser...
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Kuhns

customer_reviews.title: I open it, I found it just an empty ...
customer_reviews.text: I open it, I found it just an empty box!!!!! cheater I bought it for chinese, and I pay $310 for the box!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xin Yu Peng

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is ok. But not as what I expected. I already returned this watch but want to share my thoughts Pros: Design is cool, not the best, but decent Cons: Case is dull, not sure why but it doesnt look clear enough Band is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Chao

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in excellent condition, good watch, just was I was expecting for.Formal watch and excellent brand, definetely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: caroh

customer_reviews.title: The watch is very good. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, The watch is very good. Thank you very much. As I discuss with the people here I know I can receive the refund for the TAX. Could you please ask the DHL to deliver again the paper for me to refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dung Trinh Tien

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to have a Tissot watch. But it's very tricky to buy a watch online. the hands weren't working properly. We followed the manual, consulted youtube- nothing worked. I really loved the design. But had to return this and got another watch from Macy's instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmania

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gif
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful swiss watch, the wrist is eternal but you don't need twited. Look clasic and it has a modern machine inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Nadal Donoso

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a present for my brother. He loves it. It looks very good and he always wears it.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Poor Service
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a good looking watch the quality is not there. The first watch I bought from this seller never got to me so Amazon issued a full refund. The second one arrived on time but one of the links on the belt detached after one day. I contacted the company and was told they can't replace a watch that had been worn. So, it's a great looking watch, just don't take it out of the case..
customer_reviews.author: micca

product_meta.title: Tissot Men's T063.637.16.057.00 Black Dial Watch
product_meta.description:
The Tissot Tradition models are modern timepieces inspired by 1950s design. The vintage-style design is perfectly balanced with the classical details and subtle finishes such as guilloche decoration and a gently curved case. This particular model features a perpetual calendar allowing the wearer to see the date, day and month on the dial.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3.46 x 6.69 x 4.65 inches; 2.29 Ounces
 * Item model number :T0636371605700
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 CR2 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :November 18, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Tissot
 * ASIN :B005DDCPN4

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #432409 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars91 ratings

WARNING:
CHOKING HAZARD -- Small parts. Not for children under 3 yrs. The Tissot Tradition models are modern timepieces inspired by 1950s design. The vintage-style design is perfectly balanced with the classical details and subtle finishes such as guilloche decoration and a gently curved case. This particular model features a perpetual calendar allowing the wearer to see the date, day and month on the dial.
feature_bullets: Round watch featuring textured inner dial with triangular indices, Arabic numeral at 12 o'clock, and day/date windows
42 mm stainless steel case with anti-reflective sapphire dial window
Calfskin band with deployment clasp with push-button closure
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
